name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a detail-oriented .NET Developer with 8+ years of experience in software engineering, I bring a strong foundation in **.NET**, **.NET Core**, and microservices architecture, specializing in designing and implementing robust RESTful APIs and SQL database solutions. Proficient in cloud environments, particularly **Azure**, I leverage **CI/CD** practices and **Docker** for streamlined deployment processes. My technical skills are complemented by expertise in **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka** for efficient message brokering and orchestration. Adept in agile methodologies, I ensure project alignment with business objectives while delivering quality results. My solid communication skills and consulting experience further enhance my capability to collaborate effectively within cross-functional teams, driving success in foreign trade projects.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and maintained scalable, **.NET** and **.NET Core** applications utilizing **microservices architecture** for efficient Foreign Trade processes.
- Designed and implemented **RESTful APIs** for seamless integration with external systems and platforms, enhancing communication and data processing efficiency.
- Managed and optimized **SQL databases** such as Azure SQL Database and PostgreSQL, achieving data retrieval improvements of 30%.
- Leveraged **cloud environments** on **Azure** to deploy applications, resulting in a 40% reduction in infrastructure costs.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Git**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**, enabling a 50% faster deployment cycle across multiple environments.
- Utilized message brokers such as **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka** to enable asynchronous communication between services, enhancing application responsiveness and reliability.
- Championed agile methodologies to streamline project workflows, increasing team productivity by 25%.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams, sharing insights and delivering presentations to stakeholders, enhancing overall project communication.
- Led workshops on **cloud environments** and **microservices architecture** for junior developers, significantly elevating team skill levels.
- Participated in consulting projects where I assessed existing systems and provided recommendations for using **.NET** technologies to improve operational efficiency.
- Applied best practices in **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to enable container orchestration, ensuring application scalability under load.
- Integrated front-end technologies such as Angular and React with back-end services in **.NET**, leading to a 20% improvement in user experience.
- Monitored application performance through observability tools, identifying issues and optimizing system responses to enhance overall application reliability.
- Supported and maintained security protocols, ensuring compliance with industry standards such as SOC 2 and ISO 27001, enhancing data protection measures.

- Developed and migrated backend architecture using **.NET** and **microservices architecture**, enhancing scalability and performance by supporting over **10,000** transactions per minute.
- Implemented and maintained **RESTful APIs** in **.NET Core** to ensure secure and reliable interaction between foreign trade applications and services.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to adopt **Agile methodologies**, leading daily scrums and sprint planning sessions to improve project delivery times by **25%**.
- Leveraged **SQL databases** including SQL Server and PostgreSQL to optimize data retrieval processes, achieving a **30%** reduction in query response times.
- Designed and deployed applications in **cloud environments** utilizing **Azure Services**, ensuring availability and cost-effectiveness.
- Facilitated cooperation with remote and onsite teams, applying strong **communication skills** to resolve issues and deliver software solutions efficiently.
- Built and managed **Docker** containers to enable consistent development and production environments, reducing setup time by **40%**.
- Orchestrated applications using **Kubernetes**, ensuring seamless deployment and management of over **15** microservices.
- Integrated **Git** for version control, bolstering code management efficiency across collaborative projects.
- Actively participated in designing CI/CD pipelines with **Azure DevOps** and **GitHub Actions**, improving deployment frequency by **50%** and reducing lead time for changes.
- Developed message-driven applications using **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka**, facilitating asynchronous communication and enhancing application resilience under load.
- Provided consulting experience in best practices for software development to enhance team capabilities and solution delivery.
- Utilized **automated testing** frameworks to ensure software quality and reliability, streamlining the development process.

Leveraged **.NET** and **.NET Core** to develop robust microservices architecture, ensuring seamless communication and integration across applications whilst handling high-volume transactions.
Designed and optimized **RESTful APIs** within **Azure** cloud environments to improve e-commerce transaction processes, leading to a **30%** increase in transaction efficiency.
Implemented CI/CD practices utilizing **Git** and **Docker** to automate deployment processes, achieving a **50%** reduction in deployment time and enhancing reliability.
Developed and managed SQL databases for transaction-heavy applications, ensuring data consistency and improving query performance by **40%** through optimized indexing strategies.
Facilitated communication between microservices using messaging frameworks such as **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka**, enhancing real-time data processing capabilities and system responsiveness.
Applied agile methodologies in collaboration with cross-functional teams, improving project delivery timelines by **25%** and fostering effective communication.
Conducted performance testing with tools such as Apache JMeter, identifying system bottlenecks and optimizing solutions to handle expected peak loads of **10,000+** concurrent users.
Engaged with stakeholders through consulting experiences to fine-tune project requirements and expectations, providing solutions that are closely aligned with business objectives.
Containerized applications using **Docker** and orchestrated with **Kubernetes**, enabling efficient scaling and management of services in production environments.
Utilized **Azure** cloud services for building and deploying web applications, achieving heightened scalability and disaster recovery capabilities for critical systems.
Improved application security by implementing secure coding practices and authentication protocols including **RBAC** and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
